description:
导读：2016美国Billboard音乐奖在周日晚上的拉斯维加斯拉开帷幕, 在这里，一些音乐大咖上演了震撼、热情以及娱乐观众的表演。但并不是每一个明星都可以在盛典上光彩照人, 有一些就给观众留下了无法名状的……深刻印象==英语君就为你来盘点一下本次billboard舞台上让人惊艳、出糗连连还有迷之尴尬的精彩瞬间！

THE BEST最好的瞬间

1. Celine Dion Rules the Stage席琳·迪翁称霸舞台！

In her first televised performance since the death of her husband, Rene Angelil, Dion was honored with the Icon Award and delivered a powerful, fierce rendition of Queen's single "The Show Must Go On." 这是继她丈夫安杰利·戴恩去世之后的第一次电视演出，带着偶像大奖的荣耀，席琳·迪翁翻唱了Queen乐队的经典单曲《The Show Must Go On》：强劲有力、激烈汹涌。

2. Kesha's Stunning Cover钱妞惊艳全场的演绎

Kesha delivered an emotionally charged cover of Bob Dylan's 1964 classic "It Ain't Me, Babe," accompanied by Ben Folds on piano and violinist Rob Moose. The touching performance -- which almost didn't even happen -- elicited a standing ovation from the audience. 钱妞饱含深情地演绎了Bob Dylan1964年的经典曲目《It Ain't Me, Babe》， 由Ben Folds钢琴伴奏，Rob Moose小提琴伴奏。如此震撼人心的表演之前几乎见所未见，博得了观众站起来为其鼓掌喝彩。

3. Rihanna Shows Her True Vocal Talent蕾哈娜展现了真正的音色天分

Rihanna's stripped-down vocals and raw, emotional delivery of her ballad "Love on the Brain," stood out among many of the more explosive, flashy performances of the night.蕾哈娜的那自然天生、充满感情的音色为观众带来了她的抒情歌《Love on the Brain》，在众多动感华丽富有爆发力的表演中脱颖而出。

4. Fans Losing Their Minds Over Justin Bieber比伯一出来，迷妹都疯了……

When Bieber came out to perform "Sorry," some of his fans in the audience absolutely lost their minds. Seriously, there were some fans literally crying in their seats to see a 22-year-old walk around a stage while his backup dancers worked their hearts out.当比伯出场表演《Sorry》时，全场迷妹迷弟全疯了==更夸张的是，当比伯的伴舞跳的起劲，这名22岁的偶像在舞台上穿梭时，有些粉丝直接在座位上嚎啕大哭起来。

THE WORST最差的瞬间

1. Keeping a Secret from Celine Dion想要瞒住席琳迪翁？！

As Dion came up to accept her Icon Award, presenter Seal revealed that they had a surprise guest to actually give her the trophy. That surprise turned out to be her eldest son, Rene-Charles, and it was clear from the look on her face that Dion was legitimately unaware that this was going to happen. It was a sweet moment, but no one keeps a secret from Celine Dion! No one!当席琳上台领奖（偶像大奖）时，颁奖人Seal说有一位神秘嘉宾来为她颁奖给她一个惊喜——就是她的大儿子Rene-Charles！从表情就可以看出席琳感觉非常吃惊，真的是万万没想到！这种场景虽然很温馨，但是没人能瞒住席琳迪翁，没人！

2. The beginning of Britney Spears's Performance布兰妮的表演开场

We've already established that Spears' explosive opening number got really good, but it started off really, really bad. She came out in a red suit and danced to "Work B**ch" like a robot who forgot the choreography that it was programmed to remember. 虽然布兰妮的火爆开场非常精彩，但是表演开头却很糟，糟透了。她一袭红装出场，跳起《Work B**ch》就像一台机器人全然忘记了编排好的舞蹈。

THE WEIRDEST最诡异的瞬间

1. Ariana Grande's Outfit爱莉安娜·格兰德的服装

Grande's performance was as impressive as ever, but she rocked a half-jacket around her waist complete with straps and metal loops. The whole thing made her look like someone who escaped from of a very fashionable mental institution.爱莉安娜的表演虽然令人印象深刻，但是她将夹克系在腰间，配皮带与金属环毫无违和感，只是让她在大家眼中像一个逃出时髦精神病院的病人。

2. Britney Writhing on the Guitar布兰妮在吉他上扭来扭曲==

While the beginning of her performance was terrible, and the rest was pretty great, watching the singer gyrate on a giant guitar that she rode like a mechanical bull in a dive bar was bizarre, but in kind of a really spectacular way. 虽然她的开场表演真的很糟糕，但后面还不错哦，看一看到她在一把巨大的吉他上扭动身姿，像一个训牛手想要征服她的公牛。不过确实总让人觉得哪里不太对……
